item.title: ox-hugo Install Issue with Spacemacs
item.description: While I try to install ox-hugo on my Spacemacs, I found an issue: After reading the install and usage guide. I added ox-hugo to dotspacemacs-additional-packages and also did this: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 (defun dotspacemacs/user-config () ;; Other stuff ;; .. ;; ox-hugo config (use-package ox-hugo :ensure t ;Auto-install the package from Melpa (optional) :after ox)) Everything works fine until I restart emacs:
